name: Chancellors Way Pharmacy
comment:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for thirteen common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, andurinary tract infections
  • medication placed in blister packs (sealed, push-through packaging used to separate doses)
  • basic compounding
  • one-to-one pharmacist consultation
  • medication refill reminders
  • free delivery for prescriptions
  • seasonal immunization clinics
  • free naloxone opioid overdose prevention kits
  • ideal protein weight loss clinic
  • daily senior and student discounts

MedsCheck - review of complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Pharmacy Smoking Cessation Program - quit smoking counselling available for eligible clients
serviceProvisionCode: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP
